title: "How Businesses Simplify Device Management in a Remote Work World"
excerpt: "Throw in a worldwide pandemic and the shift to remote work, and the task gets harder. Spectrum Brands, an international consumer products company based in Middleton, Wis., is making it easier by migrating from on-premises solutions to two cloud-based services: Microsoft Intune and Azure Active Directory."
